trend_summary: 2000-sized civic grid stays intact; only incremental change occurs. Two parking/void lots are infilled, several roofs lighten or darken as they gain new membranes or solar panels, and tree canopy along avenues and parks thickens. Net footprint is nearly unchanged, but refurbishment and greening subtly intensify a dense urban core.
notable_changes: Conversion of two small surface lots into mid-rise buildings south-east of the park.
Several large roofs turn brighter/white, suggesting energy-efficient re-roofing or solar installations.
Tree canopy expansion along main boulevards and within the central oval park.
Temporary construction staging visible mid-series on a southern block, later replaced by completed structures.
Landscaping redesign in plaza courtyards of the red-brick complex near center.
